<h3 id="X11038">X(11038)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INCIRCLE-CIRCLES AND HONSBERGER</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^3-5*(b+c)*a^2+3*(b-c)^2*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11038) = 2*X(1)+X(7) = (8*R+r)*X(2)-4*R*X(210) = X(8)-4*X(142)</b>
<p>X(11038) lies on these lines:{1,7}, {2,210}, {3,2346}, {8,142}, {9,1475}, {57,5281}, {144,1001}, {145,2550}, {226,5274}, {329,4666}, {377,6601}, {388,6894}, {404,6600}, {495,7679}, {496,7678}, {551,5850}, {553,9778}, {938,5261}, {942,5657}, {944,5805}, {952,1056}, {954,999}, {971,5049}, {1000,1159}, {1058,6147}, {1100,5819}, {1125,5223}, {1156,1387}, {1279,4644}, {1320,10427}, {1385,5759}, {1420,5766}, {1445,3333}, {1449,5838}, {1471,9440}, {1621,9965}, {1898,3485}, {2099,8255}, {3085,5445}, {3146,10404}, {3241,5853}, {3242,4648}, {3254,6224}, {3295,7676}, {3338,3523}, {3474,3748}, {3487,5045}, {3560,5843}, {3617,3826}, {3623,5880}, {3685,4454}, {3870,9776}, {3982,9580}, {4654,9812}, {4675,4864}, {4860,5218}, {5226,7988}, {5290,6744}, {5308,7174}, {5435,10980}, {5493,5586}, {5528,9802}, {5550,6666}, {5704,10172}, {5762,10246}, {5779,5901}, {6765,11024}, {6904,7674}, {7673,9957}, {9446,9533}, {10569,11018}, {10865,11035}</p>
<p>
X(11038) = midpoint of X(7) and X(8236)<br>
X(11038) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (390,8236), (5686,2), (5817,5886), (8236,1)<br>X(11038) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,7,390), (1,3664,4344), (1,3671,9785), (1,4298,4313), (1,4310,3672), (1,4321,7675), (1,4327,3100), (1,4334,2293), (1,4355,4314), (1,5542,7), (1,11037,3600), (57,10578,5281), (142,3243,8), (144,3622,1001), (226,10580,5274), (354,3475,2), (553,10389,9778), (954,999,7677), (3333,5703,5265), (3487,5728,8232), (5045,5728,11025), (5572,8581,10394)<br></p>
